title: Asia Gardens Hotel & Thai Spa launches new Eastern-inspired wellness programme
text:
Asia Gardens Hotel & Thai Spa launches new Eastern-inspired wellness programme Asia Gardens Hotel & Thai Spa launches new Eastern-inspired wellness programme Details Category: Hotel   11:45 Asia Gardens Hotel & Thai Spa in Alicante is encouraging its guests to adopt an Oriental approach to health and wellbeing this autumn with the introduction of a new Rebirth Wellness Programme designed to improve physical and mental strength, prevent illness and promote general wellbeing. Launching in September, the new Rebirth Wellness package, based on sacred Oriental principles passed down by generations of the Chinese imperial family, can be booked on a two, four, seven and nine night basis. 
The Rebirth Wellness programme involves three key components which are tailored to the individual requirements of each guest and include: · On arrival all guests are given a Bioenergetic screening with a highly-respected local doctor. This is a new and non-invasive evaluation of a person’s energetic health and balance using a pioneering technique which measures the body’s electrical responses from the major organs. Any imbalances will be addressed and a bespoke wellness itinerary will be designed to meet the individual health requirements of each guest. This method is also very effective for early detection of diseases · Daily 60 minute masterclasses with experts in the Eastern-inspired practices of Yoga, meditation, Tai chi and Chikung (The ancient Chinese practice which involves breathing techniques, gentle exercises and movements that are repeated a number of times to increase fluid movement around the body, building awareness of how the body moves through space.) All teachers are experts in their field, including Tai Chi and Chikung teacher, Begoña Baño, two gold medal winner and former Spanish Champion of Tai Chi Chuan · A full-board healthy meal plan allowing guests to dine in any of the resort’s seven restaurants where nutritious meal options will be highlighted, allowing guests to optimise the health benefits of the Programme Price start from *€936 (£664) per person for a four-night Wellness Package including: • Luxurious accommodation in a double deluxe room (single supplement may apply) on a full board basis (allowing guests to dine in the resort’s seven restaurants) • One individual Bioenergetic screening • Choice of multiple daily masterclasses - choosing from Yoga, meditation, Tai chi and Chikung • Two healthy Asian cooking classes • A kimono for use during the stay for all Eastern-inspired masterclasses • Daily snack of seasonal fresh fruit *Price based on a stay between 13-22 November Guests will also have the opportunity to supplement their individual Wellness Programme with a choice of therapeutic spa treatments including acupuncture, Ayurvedic and Thai massage, body rituals as well as personal training in the hotel’s fully-equipped gym. The Thai spa is a haven of wellbeing and relaxation where therapists who studied the fine arts in the Wat Po Temple in Bangkok – where the first traditional Thai Massage techniques were originally taught – deliver the many pampering treatments. Other highlights include a recently upgraded fitness centre, five interior massage rooms, seven outdoor stilt cabins with tatamis for traditional Thai massage , heated indoor pool with outdoor access, Turkish bath, outdoor Jacuzzi, solarium and relaxation area. The new Rebirth Wellness Programme can be booked on a two, four, seven and nine night basis during dedicated weeks throughout the year, allowing guests to fully benefit from the programme.
